## validateRepetitionRule() function

Validate a repetition rule. Returns null if valid (or undefined), or a CliError if invalid.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function validateRepetitionRule(
  rule:
    | {
        frequency: string;
        interval: number;
        repeatMethod: string;
        daysOfWeek?: number[] | undefined;
        dayOfMonth?: number | undefined;
      }
    | undefined
): CliError | null;
```
